allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add public workflow guide and GitHub Pages setup

- Add WIP disclaimer to README
- Rename repo URLs to claude-code-my-workflow
- Create landing page at docs/index.html
- Copy rendered guide to docs/ for GitHub Pages
- Link README to live guide at psantanna.com

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(__NEW_LINE_77bd949e94484a81__ echo -e "\\n3. No gradients \(should be clean background\):")
Bash(__NEW_LINE_7726a439b675366b__ echo -e "\\n7. Read the full guide button:")
Bash(__NEW_LINE_7726a439b675366b__ echo -e "\\n9. Getting started code block:")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Redesign landing page and workflow guide styling

- Replace over-designed landing page with clean academic layout
- Add custom Quarto SCSS theme \(navy/gold tables, callouts, headings\)
- Fix inline code styling via include-in-header override
- Remove title-block-banner, Scott mention, ChatGPT comparison
- Add WIP banner to guide, update repo URLs to claude-code-my-workflow

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
